TextLibrary.Text: See, Syrus? I told you I'd find some Undead for you to fight!
See, Syrus? I told you I'd find some Undead for you to fight!
See, Syrus? I told you I'd find some Undead for you to fight!
See, Syrus? I told you I'd find some Undead for you to fight!
It seems you have delivered, but take care; I sense the hand of an Arkliche behind this attack.
It seems you have delivered, but take care; I sense the hand of an Arkliche behind this attack.
It seems you have delivered, but take care; I sense the hand of an Arkliche behind this attack.
It seems you have delivered, but take care; I sense the hand of an Arkliche behind this attack.

They rise from the body of a dead Sorcerer. I have only encountered one in my travels. He slew my betrothed, Liandra, and I had to flee. They are a dangerous foe, beyond all others you have faced thus far.
